## Python CSV Column Splitting Tool

This project creates a Python tool that reads CSV files and splits single columns into multiple columns.

### Project Requirements
- Python script to read CSV files
- Split one column into two columns based on delimiter
- Output the modified CSV
- Handle different delimiters and column positions

### Development Guidelines
- Use pandas for CSV manipulation
- Provide clear command line interface
- Handle edge cases (missing data, different delimiters)
- Include error handling and validation
